body:
There was breaking changes in 1.4.0 and you need to use <canvas baseChart...></canvas> instead of <base-chart...></base-chart>.

As mentioned in this git issue

See the breaking changes here

BREAKING CHANGES

charts: - base-chart component became baseChart directive so you need to convert

<base-chart...></base-chart>

to

<canvas baseChart...></canvas>

and most probably wrap in

 <div style='display:block'>...</div>
title: NG2-Charts Error Can't Bind Datasets To Base-Charts In Angular2 After Update
